name: Zaniest Zapper
body:
## v0.12.0 (2020-10-28)

### Features

* Add seek-to opt to cast cmd (#307) [theychx]

* Add remote-only subtitles to the API (#258) [Stavros Korokithakis]

### Fixes

* Wait longer for the Chromecast to connect to the HTTP server (#295) [Edd Barrett]

### Feature
* Use new Youtube controller (#156) (63afcb28f2a0345c8c2646c2dd92f9bb2b4daf6f)
* Add stable API (349489ef93a10dedd9c0ad0ed237cfad931a2567)

### Fix
* Make use of --ytdl-opt imply --force-default (#150) (682db1418fd0d362eb2366b4656ee25379fe4e33)

### Feature
* Use user specified format filter (#129) (3f56370f2a4c0f7786040a57c7cf94c188195e5d)

### Fix
* Correct cast_site and write_config command names (#134) (bb040b0d5c747f12130519d5d7fa18d9df0c854d)
* Give correct error messages with Dashcast (#133) (138f580568d4cb62675755eb8d67870577c8127a)

### Feature
* Add YouTube-DL option command line parameter (f2275ab378f3008ccd52e9e6e6ee347e78c4a4e1)
* Group support (#120) (9ec5321de462f14f7a92b02407320d667ff8a594)

### Fix
* Make save files portable (#125) (cdbf75be529e110f8d634b0cf03f02fe4cd43b63)
* Fix "playing" never getting set (#113) (527fd9c5c34dd8624e61c533353465ca2496d918)
* Fix ids and thumbnails not returned for active playlist entries (#112) (56ac9400c79e1b5355ff445a2a7272b6b60feb20)
* Make save restore more robust (#111) (4643cb02fe9a536104ee4996449fd072b00daa69)
* Fail if a file given as a cli argument does not exist (#109) (4458eaf148b41966b57151576da6ce56e67ddd22)
* Make cast_site accept stdin as argument (#108) (7e0f7c396c1f9bbbecefa9096a637d2acfb30e2d)
* Make dashcast work with audio devices (#107) (953f3830bbf8bccf08660c9c8c25ffe10a232d7f)

### Feature
* Cast a website to Chromecast (via DashCast) (#102) (b66f205ac6de4c218727d814b283b7e1b130a849)
* Cast file with local or remote subtitles (#93) (edd22b4b4169f12b64db1830a0c458b7e7d295ce)

### Fix
* Use netifaces instead of socket for get_local_ip (#100) (8e1cbc4c304dfae3e4d197f818a2ef9cfe781a74)
* Guess the content type of remote files as well (e003fe78ccc77ef42de0cd9e12ad7a85e0055b18)
* Specify the correct mimetype when casting local files (#96) (0bbb6f04f7ff28f9e0684ab4c26d208ae0d1b0a1)

### Fix
* Fix readconfig failing on py <3.6 (#95) (c3ce9c7d0d6d12da14e5eb4d334f65368c0a2686)
* Use a more educational example Youtube link (#92) (64dfb08555800092e80c8dd823eb8de37d0a6fe0)

### Feature
* Play random playlist entry (#86) (e6ae93e62845319c9685bfe0a5bedd351e5f304a)
* Save/restore (#84) (cdaf29aa50d245f7ad89ee5aab97dd5d63371844)

### Fix
* Improve kill (#85) (4f838ada9ef95b2817e6526e5b0b51f0cac8abc5)

### Feature
* Add force default option to cast command (#76) (472b53f7374afc369fc27accb2164dad8367c6aa)

### Fix
* Remove py2 compat code (#75) (2b7cdabd802153267bbe4dcd47afbc0012e22c65)

### Fix
* Misc improvements/fixes for final Python 2 release (#69) (cbb4cc984d06fd128e9af66b53abeaa85df9429c)

### Fix
* Make status command more useful (#65) (97427902b058867426c3f9aece851791730294b6)
* Proper fix for add action (#64) (9fee4e5401a15fe5c8172497ecccb8cd3e763ca7)
* Make info command more useful (#63) (c6d06a69cf4880a117db1d2319706cad31b7c02c)

Feature
-------
 - Make status use regular time descriptions (#32)
 - Add argument to volumeupdown (#29)
 - Add scanning for local Chromecasts


Fix
---
 - Further improve play_media (#31)
 - Rework CastController.init
 - Do state_check in CastController.init
 - Make check_state private
 - Correct timeout parameter type
 - Make catt work with pychromecast 0.8.0

### Feature
- Add local file casting support.

### Feature
- Add additional volume and info commands

### Feature
- Add ability to fast forward and adjust volume

### Fix
- Pin to a different youtube-dl version (fixes #2).

## Feature
- Show title instead of URL when playing.

## Fix
- Don't die on video URLs that point to the video file itself.
- Remove decimals from status time.
- Don't crash on status if nothing is playing.

### Fix
- Make the CLI interface more self-documenting.
- Fix rewind.

### Fix
- Fix setup.py crash due to missing history.

### Documentation
- Delete history.

### Feature
- Change the Chromecast stop command to kill.
- Add more commands.

### Fix
- Make temporary directory finding cross-platform.
- Remove unused import.

### Documentation
- Update README.
